scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:server && npm run clean:mongo
scripts.clean:server: cd typescript-apollo-express-graphql-api && rm -rf node_modules/ && mkdir node_modules && touch ./node_modules/.gitignore && cd .. && npm run restore:server:gitignore
scripts.clean:mongo: cd mongo && rm -rf mongodata/ && mkdir mongodata && touch ./mongodata/.gitignore & cd ..
scripts.restore:server:gitignore:
echo '# Ignore everything in this directory
*
# Except this file
!.gitignore' > ./typescript-apollo-express-graphql-api/node_modules/.gitignore
